name: Speedcube Rubik
description:
The application is design to allow you to solve as quick as possible the famous Rubik cube puzzle.
You can scramble the cube using a 25 moves generated sequence and then you can try a solve as quick as you can.
In order to allow to be fast, you can adjust the cube rotation speed and face rotation speed from the options menu.
In case you need help, you can check the OLL and PLL algorithms in the help section.
Best time and fewest moves solves will be recorded for you.
